(Simplified: 铂)
Chinese Definition:
①一種金屬元素，可制坩鍋、蒸發皿，亦是化學上常用的催化劑。鉑和銥的合金是製造自來水筆筆尖的材料。

鉑字的基本解释

鉑
bó
见“铂”。

鉑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bó］
［《集韻》白各切，入鐸，並。］
“铂1”的繁体字。
金属元素，符号Pt。银白色，有光泽，富延展性，导热导电性能好，化学性质稳定。可以做坩埚、电极等，也用做催化剂。铂和铱的合金是制造自来水笔尖的材料。通称白金。

鉑字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鉑； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1301第07
【集韻】白各切，音泊。金薄也。【正字通】金鉑，薄金也。藥紙隔金屑錘之，金已薄，紙不損。紙初褐色，久則色似烏金。本借薄，俗加金作鉑。

platinum
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bó］
["Ji Yun" cut each white, enter the duo, and merge. ]
Traditional characters for "platinum 1".
Metal element, symbol Pt. Silvery white, shiny, extensible, good thermal and electrical conductivity, stable chemical properties. It can be used as a crucible, electrode, etc., and also as a catalyst. The alloy of platinum and iridium is the material used to make the nib of the tap. Commonly known as platinum.
platinum
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　 Platinum; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1301 Page 07
[Ji Yun] Bai each cut, the sound is parked. Jin Bo also. 【Zhengzitong】Gold and platinum, thin gold. The medicinal paper is hammered away from the gold scraps, the gold is thin, and the paper is not damaged. The paper is brown at the beginning, but looks like black gold after a long time. The book is thin, and the vulgar adds gold as platinum.
